for max in $(seq 100 100 1000); do
    echo -n "max=$max  "
    prism model.prism m.props -sim -simsamples 100 -const maxPop=$max | \
      grep "Result"
done

R{"g1"}=? [ C<=100 ]
R{"g2"}=? [ C<=100 ]
R{"t1"}=? [ C<=100 ]
R{"t2"}=? [ C<=100 ]
